vehicle.name: Landstalker
vehicle.description: An in-depth look at creating applications with XML.

vehicle.name: Ralls, Kim
vehicle.title: Midnight Rain
vehicle.description: A former architect battles corporate zombies, an evil sorceress, and her own childhood to become queen of the world.

vehicle.name: Corets, Eva
vehicle.title: Maeve Ascendant
vehicle.description: After the collapse of a nanotechnology society in England, the young survivors lay the foundation for a new society.

vehicle.name: Corets, Eva
vehicle.title: Oberon's Legacy
vehicle.description: In post-apocalypse England, the mysterious agent known only as Oberon helps to create a new life for the inhabitants of London. Sequel to Maeve Ascendant.

vehicle.name: Corets, Eva
vehicle.title: The Sundered Grail
vehicle.description: The two daughters of Maeve, half-sisters, battle one another for control of England. Sequel to Oberon's Legacy.

vehicle.name: Randall, Cynthia
vehicle.title: Lover Birds
vehicle.description: When Carla meets Paul at an ornithology conference, tempers fly as feathers get ruffled.

vehicle.name: Thurman, Paula
vehicle.title: Splish Splash
vehicle.description: A deep sea diver finds true love twenty thousand leagues beneath the sea.

vehicle.name: Knorr, Stefan
vehicle.title: Creepy Crawlies
vehicle.description: An anthology of horror stories about roaches, centipedes, scorpions and other insects.

vehicle.name: Kress, Peter
vehicle.title: Paradox Lost
vehicle.description: After an inadvertant trip through a Heisenberg Uncertainty Device, James Salway discovers the problems of being quantum.

vehicle.name: O'Brien, Tim
vehicle.title: Microsoft .NET: The Programming Bible
vehicle.description: Microsoft's .NET initiative is explored in detail in this deep programmer's reference.

vehicle.name: O'Brien, Tim
vehicle.title: MSXML3: A Comprehensive Guide
vehicle.description: The Microsoft MSXML3 parser is covered in detail, with attention to XML DOM interfaces, XSLT processing, SAX and more.

vehicle.name: Galos, Mike
vehicle.title: Visual Studio 7: A Comprehensive Guide
vehicle.description: Microsoft Visual Studio 7 is explored in depth, looking at how Visual Basic, Visual C++, C#, and ASP+ are integrated into a comprehensive development environment.
